document.full_text: "phone rings, door chimes, in comes company." so goes the title song from stephen sondheim and george furth's innovative 1970 musical about marriage, commitment and new york neuroticism. but "company" has perhaps never welcomed such a starry guest list as the one performing with the new york philharmonic.
document.title: theater review: 'company'
lines_and_colors: "phone rings, door chimes, in comes company." so goes the title song from stephen sondheim and george furth's innovative 1970 musical about marriage, commitment and new york neuroticism. but "company" has perhaps never welcomed such a starry guest list as the one performing with the new york philharmonic.
